attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC is proposing to scrap BBC 6 Music, which features a range of programming un-catered for elsewhere.

Scrapping BBC 6 Music has been criticised by the BPI and the industry.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
